translations: 无耻的；鲁莽的；放肆无礼的

sentences.sentence: Here Tink, who was in her bedroom, eavesdropping, squeaked out something impudent.
sentences.translation: 叮叮铃在她的卧室里偷听着，尖声说了些无礼的话。

sentences.sentence: Some of them spoke pleasantly and were well behaved, while others were impudent and insulting.
sentences.translation: 他们当中的一些人谈吐不俗、举止得体，而另一些人则行为不恭、傲慢无礼。
他是个厚颜无耻的家伙！
